resources.string: This device is available for checkout! Please visit the circulation desk in the Guerrieri Academic Commons to check it out.
This device is checked out and is currently due back on %1$s.
Unfortunately, this device is temporarily unavailable.
This usually means that there is an issue with the device that needs to be addressed before we can check it out again (such as physical damage, etc.).
We hope to return this device to circulation as soon as possible.
Please note that device availability changes constantly, so we cannot guarantee that any particular device will be available.
